00040 /**
00041  * @brief Class to run the DMET analysis
00042  */
00043 class DmetEngine : public BaseEngine {
00044 
00045     public:
00046 
00047 
00048                 virtual std::string getEngineName() { return DmetEngine::EngineName(); }
00049                 static const std::string EngineName() { return "DmetEngine"; }
00050

00052                 * Constructor
00053                 */
00054                 DmetEngine();
00055 
00056                 /**
00057                 * Destructor
00058                 */

00060 
00061                 /*! A class to register the summary engine. */
00062                 class Reg : public EngineReg
00063                 {
00064                 public:
00065                         /*! Constructor - register the summary engine. */
00066                         Reg() : EngineReg(DmetEngine::EngineName())
00067                         {
00068                         }
00069 
00070                         /*! Creates an object.
00071                          * @return The object.
00072                          */
00073                         BaseEngine *MakeObject() { return new DmetEngine; }
00074                 };
00075 
00076                 /*! The one and only registration object. */
00077                 static Reg reg;
00078 
00079                 /*! Converts the type to the summary engine type.
00080                  * @param chip The pointer to the base engine object.
00081                  * @return The summary engine type or NULL if not compatible.
00082                  */
00083                 static DmetEngine * FromBase(BaseEngine *engine);
